actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Foreign Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 93-123.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, S. Rept. 93-400.

official_title: A bill to amend section 101(b) of the Micronesian Claims Act of 1971 to enlarge the class of persons eligible to receive benefits under the claims program established by that Act.

summary.text: Includes as eligible for war claims benefits pursuant to the Micronesian Claims Act a Micronesian inhabitant of the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands who became a citizen of the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands on July 18, 1947, and who is a citizen of the United States as of the date of filing a claim. Provides that, as claims are adjudicated, the Micronesian Claims Commission shall certify them to the Secretary of the Interior for payment in such manner as he may direct.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 101(b) of the Micronesian Claims Act of 1971 to enlarge the class of persons eligible to receive benefits under the claims program established by that Act.
